\subsection*{API CHANGE 2.0 }

\par
 List of the scheduled changes for the GFal 2.0 API \begin{Desc}
\item[Warning:]this is not a final choice\end{Desc}
\subsubsection*{I. OFFICIAL API : }

\begin{itemize}
\item Gfal POSIX lib API:\begin{itemize}
\item the Common functions API : \doxyref{all common functions}{p.}{group__common__group} \par
\item the POSIX style API : \doxyref{all POSIX style function}{p.}{group__posix__group} \par
 \par
\end{itemize}
\item Gfal REQUEST lib API :\begin{itemize}
\item the SRM style API : \doxyref{all SRM functions}{p.}{group__srm__group} \par
\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } LFC\_\-API : \doxyref{internal LFC functions}{p.}{group__lfc__low__group}\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } SFN\_\-API : \doxyref{sfn low level functions}{p.}{group__sfn__low__group}\item {\bf  internal API, use at your own risks } internal functions of gfal : \doxyref{internal functions}{p.}{group__internal__group}\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}


\subsubsection*{II. ANOTHER DOCS : }

\begin{itemize}
\item More informations about the GError system : \tt{http://developer.gnome.org/glib/stable/glib-Error-Reporting.html}\item More informations about the use of GList : \tt{http://developer.gnome.org/glib/stable/glib-Doubly-Linked-Lists.html\#g-list-free-full} \end{itemize}
